channel.title: New server in beta mode
channel.description:
okay i am now releaseing my server for beta use beta testers will get mod right post below if u would like to become a beta tester give me name u will use to log on i will PM HAM and no-ip details to you i will have 4 beta testers inculding my bro i will be on but i will not be testing so right now only a max of 5 players
beta testers : Dr. evil (co-owner :open :open :open
edit:u can also giving constutive critizim in the beta u can PM me if u want to be a beta tester
